This gratuity will be shared by the service and culinary teams."

A 10% take-out service fee is added to all to-go and online orders which goes directly to the kitchen team.

comments: "No tipping" establishment

comments: "Prices reflect cash pricing. A 3.8% fee is charged for all credit card transactions. 20% gratuity is charged for parties of 5 or more and checks over $200"

name: Vitello's
comments: 3.5% Kitchen appreciation fee (removable by request)

name: Win~dow
comments: 3% Happy & Healthy Surcharge

name: Wolfsglen
comments: "3% surcharge. This is not a service charge or gratuity and will not be paid to your. server." "20% gratuity will be added to parties of 6 or greater"

name: Wood Pizza
comments: Including pick-up orders

name: Xuntos
comments: 20% service charge per them "non-negotiable."

name: Yang's Kitchen
comments: "1% ZFP Restore the Planet fee is added to your bill to help restore the planet and combat climate change. You can opt out of this fee if you’d like"

name: Zuzu's Pretzels
comments: "A 5% service charge will be added to each guest check to ensure competitive industry compensation for all of our valued full time team members. In support of this initiative, the entirety of the charge is retained by the company."
